thread.section_title: Spa World Australia Pty Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Spa World Australia Pty Ltd | spaworld.com.au
thread.title: Neil Sanders
thread.title_full: Spa World Australia Pty Ltd reviewed by Neil Sanders

author: Neil Sanders
title: Neil Sanders
text:
My sister in law and I bought a spa each requiring some challenges for installation at her place in Adelaide and some logistics for delivery of mine to country Victoria. Steve was a great help in the smooth delivery & installation plus very supportive in teaching us how to maintain and enjoy the experience. I am very happy with the performace of the spa and it has surpassed my expectations of what it could do. Steve has continued to quickly respond to any issues we have raised and thank him for his support.
Neil Sanders
Lake Boga
Victoria
Ph 042990852
